question.title: Error running 'Tomcat 9' Cannot invoke "com.intellij.javaee.appServers.appServers.appServerIntegrations.ApplicationServer.getPersistentData()"
question.body:
When I start project then I am getting an error:

Error running 'Tomcat 9' 
Cannot invoke "com.intellij.javaee.appServers.appServers.appServerIntegrations.ApplicationServer.getPersistentData()" because the return value of "com.intellij.javaee.appServers.run.configuration.CommonModel.getApllicationServer()" is null

I see it first time - what can cause this issue?

I tried with tomcat 9.0.24 and 9.0.37 and error is the same.
